sql-script.name: content script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table simple_bbs_forum ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null, name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, status tinyint not null, showtags bit not null, description varchar(256), oorder bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (name) );
create table simple_bbs_forum_stat ( id bigint not null, lastpostid bigint, topics int, messages int, primary key(id) );
create table simple_bbs_user ( id bigint not null, lastpostid bigint, topics int, messages int, deletes int, primary key(id) );

create table simple_bbs_topic ( id bigint not null, catalogid bigint not null, topic varchar(128) not null, keywords varchar(128), lastpostid bigint, views bigint not null, replies int not null, attentions int not null, star tinyint not null, createdate datetime not null, userid bigint, lastupdate datetime, lastuserid bigint, lastpostupdate datetime, status tinyint not null, mark tinyint, ttype tinyint, ttop bit, oorder bigint not null, primary key(id) );

create table simple_bbs_posts ( id bigint not null, topicid bigint not null, firstpost bit not null, ip varchar(32), createdate datetime not null, userid bigint, quoteid bigint, lastupdate datetime, lastuserid bigint, status tinyint not null, oorder bigint not null, primary key(id) );

create table simple_blog_catalog ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null, text varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, userid bigint not null, blogs int not null, description varchar(256), oorder bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (userid, text) );

create table simple_blog ( id bigint not null, catalogid bigint not null, viewtemplate varchar(2), topic varchar(128) not null, content text, keywords varchar(128), author varchar(32), source varchar(32), views bigint not null, remarks int not null, attentions int not null, allowcomments bit not null, description varchar(256), createdate datetime not null, userid bigint, lastupdate datetime, lastuserid bigint, status tinyint not null, mark tinyint, ttype tinyint, ttop bit, oorder bigint not null, primary key(id) );

create table simple_blog_remark ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null, documentid bigint not null, content text not null, support int not null, opposition int not null, ip varchar(32), createdate datetime not null, userid bigint, lastupdate datetime, lastuserid bigint, primary key(id) );

create table simple_app_news ( id bigint not null, catalogid bigint not null, viewtemplate varchar(2), topic varchar(128) not null, content text, keywords varchar(128), author varchar(32), source varchar(32), views bigint not null, remarks int not null, attentions int not null, allowcomments bit not null, description varchar(256), createdate datetime not null, userid bigint, lastupdate datetime, lastuserid bigint, status tinyint not null, mark tinyint, ttype tinyint, ttop bit, oorder bigint not null, primary key(id) );

create table simple_app_news_remark ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null, documentid bigint not null, content text not null, support int not null, opposition int not null, ip varchar(32), createdate datetime not null, userid bigint, lastupdate datetime, lastuserid bigint, primary key(id) );
